title: Morning Yoga on the Beach♡
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Hnnh, doing yoga while basking in the morning sun feels good~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Having morning yoga on the beach really makes me feel like a celebrity~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hey Kasumi, are the poses not too hard?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>They’re fine. They only go as far as make me feel good from stretching my body.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, I’m glad. Alright, we’re going to go through the whole thing now~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hnnnaaaaaah~! What is this!? Just what is with this Tokusatsu hero-like pose!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It’s a form of arm balance poses. It will train up your cores~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hnngguguuh~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Perfect! Then let’s move on to something harder!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin can’t do any more than this~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
